name: Ent merchant(LD44)
description:
Strange game The idea was to make game about ent that grows wood, then sell it. So his wood is his currency.

But i have no idea about mechanic. So i made simple game about ent merchant that sell 'magic' grass.

Music and sounds from Kenney and freesound.

https://freesound.org/people/FreqMan/sounds/42919/

https://freesound.org/people/abett/sounds/316998/

LD: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/ent-merchant
